about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a realm teeming with monsters that torment innocent lives. Vanquish fearsome creatures, including archmonsters, and safeguard everyone in your path. Befriend a mystical shadow dog to assist you on your perilous journey.

Confront unique adversaries like orcs and zombies across various locations. Each monster boasts distinct abilities and tactics to challenge your hero. Beware of their lethal attacks, such as poison, to avoid an untimely demise.

Strengthen your hero by upgrading your skills, choosing between the sword or magic. As you progress through the game, gather valuable experience points to unlock new talents and enhance your character's prowess. Train diligently and develop a versatile skillset, ensuring you're well-equipped for the epic confrontation with the fearsome archmonsters that await.

With relentless monsters at every turn, stay vigilant and survive as long as possible on the desolate battlefields.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher

  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570

short_description: Embark on an exciting journey in Heroes Quest Survival. Unite with fellow heroes to liberate lands from monstrous orcs and zombies. Master the art of swordplay and sorcery to rescue innocent lives in this thrilling quest.
